reviewText: One of my favorite Garden shows. I really enjoy the series.
She's a cutie and she gives good advice on the basics of Gardening. This is an excellent DVD to start gardening with. You'll like the upbeat flow of the advice and gorgeous color video. Get this DVD.

I love Rebecca's garden  videos. I plan on ordering more. I loved her tv program, but  the Hgtv station took her off . I work at an adult school and the teacher that teaches gardening ordered the whole set for our class. I wanted to own my own. I also like that it came so quickly in the mail.
Rebecca is creative and cute.  Lots of ideas in her DVD's.  I play them on my mini DVD player when I am in the kitchen cooking.  My containers were so ugly until I learned a little from Rebecca.

Rebecca does a great job of showing easy to follow, detailed, steps to gardening. She touches base with all the frequently asked questions. I have been gardening for years and wanted something to show my daughter, that would be fast.  Rebecca keeps it very interesting as well and is very organized.
